content: drops design pattern no w-479 yarn group c + c + c -------------------------------------------------------- measurements approx 83 cm / 32 3/4 in diameter see explanation below for larger carpet materials drops paris from garnstudio 700 g color 01 apricot for small carpet in picture drops crochet hook size 8 mm / l/11 or size needed to get 8 double_crochet in width and 4 5 double_crochet vertically with 3 strands paris = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 pattern a 1 and a 2 = 4 row with double_crochet vertically the carpet can be crocheted to desired measurements we made a smaller carpet that measures approx 83 cm/ 32 3/4 in diameter and one a bit larger that measures approx 125 cm/ 49 in diameter for the small carpet you need 700 g paris as explained above and for the larger one you need approx 1300 g paris note if you use a super bulky yarn instead of 3 strands of the paris cotton you will need about a third of the yardage listed
